document_data.name: Leviathan Ale
document_data.mainbody: '''Leviathan ale''' was the house [[ale]] of the [[Beached Leviathan]] tavern in [[Neverwinter]]. The amber brew was cloudy in color.
document_data.Powers: Leviathan ale possessed some invigorating and energizing properties.
document_data.History: In the mid-to-late-15{{th}} century [[DR]], Leviathan ale was a cheap and popular libation among the adventuring population of Neverwinter. This  alcoholic drink was brewed on sight at the Beached Leviathan.
